meanings.sent1: She ran fastly to catch the bus.
meanings.sent2: The car zoomed fastly down the highway.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel climbed fastly up the tree, surprising everyone.
meanings.sent4: Time flies fastly when you're having fun.
meanings.sent5: The wind howled fastly through the night, creating an eerie sound.

meanings.definition: In a secure or fixed manner
meanings.sent1: He tied the knot fastly to ensure it wouldn't come undone.
meanings.sent2: The gate was fastly locked to keep intruders out.
meanings.sent3: The cat curled up fastly in its cozy bed, feeling safe and content.
meanings.sent4: The roots of the tree held fastly to the ground during the storm.
meanings.sent5: The treasure chest was hidden fastly beneath the old oak tree, waiting to be discovered.
